title: #8 Michael Loftus, Ed Morrissey and The “N word.”
description: This week on the podcast we were joined by the wonder Michael Loftus and Ed Morrissey.  American Sniper, Michael Moore and Kevin Costner admitting to using the “N” word were all discussed.  Download it, subscribe on iTunes or watch the clips below! So on CNN, Kevin Costner admitted to having used the N word. Many times.  So what?  Does that make him a racist?  Watch for yourself and decide on whether the context matters in this instance.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
